channel.title: Im using testscape plz help with these
channel.description: how do i change the welcome chat box things, how do i add npcs that show how many players there are andthe names of admins and mods,also how do i add auto save and how do i make my self a admin or mod? ty[br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 07:25:22 PM[/size][hr]pm me also, and if u have aim, add bungienotsid plz [br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 07:34:01 PM[/size][hr]btw how do u add spawning commands to testscape, it says it disabled, i want a source that allows you to be admin, has auto save, and allows u to spawn items.......gah

item.title: Im using testscape plz help with these
item.dc:creator: @Part_k0 Part k0
item.description:
@Part_k0 wrote:

demonkilla:

how do i change the welcome chat box things, how do i add npcs that show how many players there are andthe names of admins and mods,also how do i add auto save and how do i make my self a admin or mod? ty[br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 07:25:22 PM[/size][hr]pm me also, and if u have aim, add bungienotsid plz [br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 07:34:01 PM[/size][hr]btw how do u add spawning commands to testscape, it says it disabled, i want a source that allows you to be admin, has auto save, and allows u to spawn items…gah

Well i can answer some of those things: Starter you need a compiler which actually works without errors so i suggest you get jdk6u7 and edit the compiler with one of the codes from one of the tuts. Then right click my computer selcet propeties and then go advanced
you will then see Enviroment values click that and thenif you have CLASSPATH AND PATH PUT THESE CODES INTO THE CORRESPONDING ONES
CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin;

then click okay etc you will then be able to compile
for the welcome go into your client.java file and hit ctrl+f then search in something like welcome or if you know name of source search that in and then edit and save
then click compile and you will get the code telling you that you have succesfully compiled
figure out the rest ive just gave you alot to making up part of your server =)

gl

Read full topic

dawaza, this isnt even the right topic for this question…although you could ask this question somewhere else, you would totally get flamed and everyone whould tell you to use the search button, which is exactly what im gonna do, but in a nicer way:

please learn how to use the little thing in the corner called the search button…its pretty cool because you can pretty much find whatever you’re looking for[br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 08:16:16 PM[/size][hr]oh and demonkilla, you could also use the search button, there are tuts for al those things you need
